lop Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Slop Street was located in the southwest section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward. The road curved through much of the east and southeast parts of the ward, originating in the north at the end of Fishwife Alley, curving east around the Adventurers Quarter, and eventually ending on the southern end of the Way of the Dragon. Other roads connecting with Slop Street included the Boomgarden, Curtain Alley, Dancing Court, and Fillet Lane.
Several businesses were located on Slop Street. These included the Medusas Glare, Nueths Fine Nets, and the Temple of Good Cheer.
